comments.content:
hey folks!  
NO COMMENT... does it mean the Logo of the new branche is OK?

But there is ONE fact i can't handle: the belly of "p" and "d" is NOT a geometrical circle, but the original curve of the font...  
CAN or MUST i retain that...???
